entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
